website_summaries.verdict: Provided you apply this lotion properly, chances are you will be impressed with the price and the natural-looking results.
pros: A generous size at an affordable price
Rich formula  contains natural moisturizing oils
cons: Takes a while to dry, and can cause streaking if you don't rub it in thoroughly

customer_reviews.title: Best Self Tanner Out There!!!
customer_reviews.text: Still the best self tanner out there. I'm the blonde hair, blue eyes, super fair skin type and it helps me look like I've been living on a island! I've tried everything and this is by far the best, and this specific original formula of fake bake. Not orange at all and u can reapply each night till you get your desired deepness of color. I had melanoma this past year from tanning, so I am sticking to this. Can't find a better price than here on Amazon either. Will rebuy over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good product,  like Sunkissed bronze Color.
customer_reviews.text: Looks awsome and I can’t really use all that much lotion , professional athalete compete so need to look my best . Live on the beach in Flordia . Work and full time student and mother . I don’t have much time nor do I want to do anymore perment damage from the suns UV rays . I look like a bronze golden tone . If I named it I would say island kissed by sun . Winter time life saver , I am very fair German Woman and I will tan , it just takes forever .
customer_reviews.author: Brookelyn B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm an esthetician and am always looking to be tan safely have used probably 30 different self tanners in the last few year's I have spent anywhere from 10-50 dollars on different products and this one is AMAZING, I can't believe it took so long to find it. It goes on very dark so it's nearly impossible to have streaks. It will leave your hands dark if you don't wear gloves but if you scrub well after It dries just fine. I HIGHLY suggest this.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: caused rash after several days
customer_reviews.text: I have used fake bake fair for a long time with no issues. Figured I'd try the original, despite seeing reviews stating it caused a rash since I have had no such issues. Ordered from vdcusa and used it. After about 3 days i broke out in a flesh colored rash everywhere i had applied- pretty much my whole body. The rash has lasted several days. Returning product and trying it from a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: It’s Christmas time and I look like the Grinch
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to cry. I put this product on and it turned my skin completely green AND it’s not coming off. It’s Christmas time and I look like the Grinch:( I’ve had the bottle open for 6 months - is that why? If you plan on buying this product, I’d recommend using it in the first month. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Works great - no fake orange skin
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked great for me for over 2 years. It's a good deal to purchase it online and put it on yourself. The salon's that do spray tans use this and charge people $50 for one spray... you can use this product over many times, so it's worth it! Your skin appears tan and not orange. It works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Angejeeper

customer_reviews.title: i have previously been using the St. Tropez mousse ...
customer_reviews.text: i have previously been using the St. Tropez mousse but switched to this thinking it would be easier and cheaper after a reccomednation from a friend. It barely darkens my skin tone at all and requires several days to make it as dark as one coat of st. tropez. It also barely lasts a week. I will not be repurchasing
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Great for vitiligo sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I have vitiligo and tried many brands and have come back to the Fake Bake original. It doesn't turn orange and it lasts up to a week for me. The color guide makes it easier to cover my "white" patches and blend to my natural tan. It lasts all summer when applied to over half my body but warning after a year the lotion turns green and is unuseable. I highly recommend Fake Bake for any tanning needs and for anyone with vitiligo its a great way to blend the tan.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Wynn

customer_reviews.title: It's all in the name
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few self tanners and this one is worth writing about. The end result is by far the best I've experienced, the color looks very natural and even. I'm fair skinned, and no orange! The application process is messy though-- the color of the product is very dark (espresso), and if you don't wear the gloves that are provided, you will have a hard time washing the palms of your hands. It has that usual self tanner odor, but it does go away after you shower. If you apply Fake Bake before bed, you will need to change your sheets. Follow the directions and you will have a very pretty tan that will last several days.
customer_reviews.author: julielikesalot

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years but I was a little hesitant about ordering it bc of previous reviews saying they received green liquid, which has happened to me before when I bought it from a store. But that wasn’t the case & so much cheaper then retail stores!
customer_reviews.author: mberry

customer_reviews.title: You look tan but smell terrible!
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this stuff is so disgusting! Between the actual smell of the lotion mixed with the rubber gloves, leaves you smelling like a walking rubber person! Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica D

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner on market! Cost effective and great instant color!
customer_reviews.text: The best bronzer /self tanner in the market!! Cost effective and beautiful color for any skin tone!! Instant color and last a couple days. There is no yucky self tanner scent!! I get compliments all the time when I use this product. Only downfall is application process can get messy. An application kitten and gloves are imperative !!
customer_reviews.author: MJ WIZ

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, it's easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I've heard a lot about Fake Bake and because I couldn't get hold of my regular self tanning lotion I decided to give it a go. Smells good, it's easy to apply, washing off evenly, natural golden tan. Stains clothing and bed sheets after application but it washes off the fabric with the first wash. The only missing thing is they could include a mitt with the box, not just one pair of disposable gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Kamila

customer_reviews.title: Tacky feeling!
customer_reviews.text: This has a pretty color. I did not care for the tacky feeling or the smell. Pretty color!
customer_reviews.author: Lwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Self tanner.
customer_reviews.text: It works. It’s messy. Use gloves. If you get on hands, Clorox clean up will help get it off. Comes with gloves. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a rash :(
customer_reviews.text: I reallllly wanted to like this product, but every time I used it I broke out in a rash. Applying it was easy, doesn't smell and it looked so natural, but I kept breaking out in bumps all over after applying. The bumps didn't go away until I completely stopped using it, so I know it caused them. Not sure if I have sensitive skin or what, but that was the only thing I was disappointed in and now I can no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: hayyyy12

customer_reviews.title: Long time to dry
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my favorite sunless tanner until I found mousse. Be careful, it’s kinda hard to rub in without a mitt and it takes forever and a day to dry. Awesome color tho
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Keller

customer_reviews.title: Natural look with no streaking!
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to this stuff. Great color. Easy to use and looks natural. Much healthier than UV rays!
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Good looking tan but cumbersome- not gradual, and doe snot last more than a day- single application, takes time, so i don't see the value really.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr Lykhonis

customer_reviews.title: Never fails
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t rub off or wash off it goes away naturally and evenly. Meanwhile you can be as dark as you please without harming your skin. Been using it for years! (Not intended for face!)
customer_reviews.author: Julia Buteyn

customer_reviews.title: A bad lot or old ?
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of this product and use regularly. This time however when I opened it the lotion was a dark green and smelled horrible. It stained my hands green. It was like a green dye I could not get off. I had to give it a one star to submit but would not even give it that
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A Ronning

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Tanner!
customer_reviews.text: This tanner gave my pale skin a rich dark tan. I have tried many tanners and some don't make me dark enough, some make me look a bit on the orange side, ugh. Fake Bake works beautifully, it really does provide an excellent tan. In addition, the bronzer that is in the formula not only shows me where I applied it but also allows me to have a beautiful tan right from the start. Make sure you exfoliate prior to using any tanner, btw, as it ensures even tanning. And thank you to those of you who left reviews for Fake Bake on Amazon; that is how I became introduced to it and I'm really glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: I see only these two missing from otherwise perfect product. I am glad I discovered it
customer_reviews.text: This product deserves all the glowing reviews on this site. I have used it's second edition which comes with gloves and a mitten, but it does not have the depth of the original. As always, the original is the thing and there was no need to mess with perfection. Instead what the makers of this product should have done is to add the mitten to the original and maybe design a spray bottle. I see only these two missing from otherwise perfect product. I am glad I discovered it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Danielian

customer_reviews.title: i felt like it would be alot darker
customer_reviews.text: when you put it on you think you are going to get the bronze tan, i slept with it on and am not nearly as dark as i was expecting, i felt like it would be alot darker. will try a second application and see if that will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Hillory Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Nice glowing tan
customer_reviews.text: Good product really works, need a thin layer to sit on skin surface to be effective. I put it on at bedtime black/dark sheets recommend and shower the next morning no real smell after showering left with a steak free tan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a mess
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 2 stars because you can obtain a dark, nice tan for a special occasion. That said, this product is a mess to use. THE GLOVES ARE CHEAP AND BEGAN TO TEAR APART AFTER THE SECOND USE, leaving dark, cancer looking spots on my hands for days. Bottom line, if you are willing to jump through hoops to look pretty for a special party and need instant results, this is fine. Otherwise, use one of the cheaper and more reliable products, like L'oreal. You will achieve the same results over the course of 3 days, minus the mess.
customer_reviews.author: kenya

customer_reviews.title: It's alright...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I got somewhat dark. Cons: It smells bad, it takes forever to apply, and it wears off quickly. If I had time to apply it every other night, it might be better. It takes so long to apply it though, so I find myself just saying forget it. I bought Sun Self Tanning Lotion Ultra Dark Instant Tint..and it worked so much better! I am darker the next day, and it takes like maybe 5-10 min to apply, compared to 20min with Fake Bake. It doesn't smell bad either. I would try this instead!
customer_reviews.author: roxie1590

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cure for florescent legs!
customer_reviews.text: No smell, no orangeness, no streaks and it lasts- what more could you ask? I guess cheapness and being available at the drugstore. I'm very fair, and was only looking to remove the florescent blue-whiteness of my legs so that I could wear summer skirts and swimsuits without looking like I had "naked legs". This product was perfect for removing the whitiness and leaving my legs perfectly natural looking. Not a dramatic bronzing (I'd probably have to apply a second night for that), but no one would ever guess that I was using a tanning cream.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: It woks without turning you orange!
customer_reviews.text: This does work, I read all the reviews before ordering and I must say they were correct. I try to exfoliate beforehand and always put regular lotion on my knees and elbows before applying. It does have a mild odor, but no big deal, just go to bed and get up in the morning and shower it off. It did not streak - it's easy to see where it's been applied and you just have to keep rubbing until it's on evenly. It does NOT look like a store-bought self tanner, skin is just a few shades darker. I will use this weekly all summer long!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self tanner ive ever used. And ive used alot. Im a redhead white skinned green eyed woman and the first time i used it i was so happy the way it looked on me. Best one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn stewart

customer_reviews.title: Instant tan for sure!
customer_reviews.text: This is as good as getting a spray tan. You just have to apply evenly and carefully and be prepared that it will get on your clothes and anything around for the first several hours. The odor bothered me at first, but I am getting used to it. I am amazed how this works and how it stays with you for days. Any of these self tanners dry my skin out and this one is no exception. It is keeping me out of the sun and a true time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Natural Tan Color
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I’ve been using it for years. It looks natural and I always get compliments on my complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It was already turning green so I had to throw ...
customer_reviews.text: It was already turning green so I had to throw away. Definitely been on the shelf awhile. Won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not streaky and doesn’t turn you orange..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I have tried spray tans and always ended up orange. I’ve also tried tanning beds and it runs into so much money between the membership and the tanning lotion. But fake and bake Does not turn you orange. It covers great and is not streaking. I will be buying this product again!!
customer_reviews.author: I love Hope!

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin do not use this! I followed all the steps and when i washed it off in the morning i had bumps everywhere that i had put the product on. I had this rash for a couple of days so i put aloe on it and it was better. Asked for a refund and received it. I recommend to start with a little patch of skin before you put it all over your body like i did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color was great
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid sunless tanner user since I am a pasty pale, can not tan naturally person. I used this product with latex gloves and was pleased with the color. It is a darker brown color so it does not look orange on my skin. My only reason for not purchasing this again is that I tended to get acne when I used this. Not only on my face but my shoulders and back as well. I am acne prone per say, and this product caused flare ups for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pinkish pale skin
customer_reviews.text: Everything else turns me yellow. Just wish it lasted longer and didn’t smell horrible but whatever. It does it’s job well.
customer_reviews.author: CEWP

customer_reviews.title: Rivals an air-brush tan
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. You must wear gloves when applying, but if you take your time and blend it well, it comes out looking great. Not orange at all. It can be a little tricky to do your own back/shoulders because of the fact that it does require a lot of blending in, but if you are willing to devote a little time to it, it is well worth it. I am very satisfied and will use this product as part of my weekly routine and just get airbrush tans for big events now. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Ok for touch ups
customer_reviews.text: Seems like your typical self tanning lotion...don't apply to much or uneven or you will be orange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best self tanner out there.
customer_reviews.text: As always I am 100% satisfied with fakebake. I've been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Blu Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin tone. This product goes on smoothly and has no streaking. It looks so natural that people have asked me when did I go to the beach? My dermatologist recommended this product to me. I have been using this product for a year
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: product normally good this time it was BAD
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened but the product arrived and it was green so my legs were green and it was like water to apply. It went all over my bathroom tiles and grout. I don't know if this was some sort of knock off, but it was bad and Fake Bake is not cheap. Will not order from here again. I sent an email the minute I discovered the problem and there was no response. I live in Mexico so returning is a total pain, but now I know for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My wife turned brown...Success!
customer_reviews.text: She got the tan she wanted and was drop dead smokin' hot.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried a few of these self tanners, but I went by the Amazon reviews, and this is BY FAR the best I've used. I am fair skinned (Irish descent) and when I saw how dark the cream was I got worried. Well, not to fear. This cream looks so natural and little bit goes a long way. no streaks or odd glittery shimmers like I found with others. It lasts about a week, less if I went swimming. However, I'd buy this a thousand times over again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Fake Bake! I am very fair skinned but this product does not dry too dark, I actually use 2 coats upon initial application. In my opinion, the lotion lasts longer and applies more evenly than the Fake Bake Spray. I can get at least 4 days between applications before I start to notice any fading as opposed to 2 days with any other self tanning sprays. I would recommend this product to all of my fellow pastey mamas out there!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Todd

customer_reviews.title: I have LOVED this product for YEARS
customer_reviews.text: I have LOVED this product for YEARS, and my husband is still able to use it, but unfortunately, there is a new ingredient in it to make your tan last longer that makes me break out, so I can no longer use it. As long as you don't have a reaction to it, it's the perfect self tanner.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Natural & even tan, everytime!
customer_reviews.text: This can be messy to apply but gives me a real tan that last for 3 to 5 days. I have been using it for years. I just always use gloves & apply before bed and It evenly washes off and I am left with a tan. Don't worry about streaking. I just quickly apply and it will wash off even. Works best if I have been in the sun just a couple of times before use and I am very fair. It works either way but it bumps up my tan the most if I have a little sun to go with it. I've been using this product for 5 years and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: its a pain in the butt to apply, but ...
customer_reviews.text: its a pain in the butt to apply, but not more than any other brand... its just labor intensive to keep a "lotion" tan going. It comes off on my sheets a little (but prob not more than any other brand)
customer_reviews.author: carolyn  torrillo

customer_reviews.title: I bought Fake Bake last year and LOVED it! Got it again for this summer
customer_reviews.text: I bought Fake Bake last year and LOVED it! Got it again for this summer. Began using it while out of town. Immediately noticed the white sheets at the hotel getting pinker and pinker. Then when I got home I noticed the toilet seat (sorry TMI) beginning to turn pink! I'm hoping it was just an old bottle or a fluke. I'm going to give it one more try. Hopefully the next one will be as good as it was last year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best fake tanner I have used
customer_reviews.text: It works to give a natural glow. I am not into the "fried" look so I have never tried layering it on so many times to achieve this effect. But, I do not tan via the sun but this definitely gives my paler skin a sun-kissed glow and is believable. I apply ever 3 days or so (and I shave every day). Also, some reviewers complained that it rinses right off down the drain, but that is just the color guide. My skin definitely shows the effects after rinsing off the color guide. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff ad I have tried it all. I have had spray tans and tried everything on the market. I love it is paraben free too. It has fabulous color.
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this product. When applied correctly, you get a GORGEOUS faux-tan... without running the risk of skin damage/cancer. I'll admit, I spent about $60 a month for tanning for quite sometime. I'd rather spend $60 on this product instead, knowing I'll be safe and tan! :) If you workout a lot, sweat will not make this product run. Just be consistent with it and people will have NO idea that your tan is really a tan from a bottle! Will be promoting & purchasing again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: First self tanner I've ever used. I have never purchased self tanner before because I'm afraid of streaking and the orangey look. But a coworker always has just a nice glow, nothing overpowering but just healthy looking, so I asked her and she suggested this one. It was easy to apply and left me with a nice color, no streaking and the scent was fine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: best color
customer_reviews.text: great natural color. It does rub off on clothing but comes out when washed promptly. Wish it would last longer, but it is the better product compared to most others
customer_reviews.author: marian

customer_reviews.title: Good tan but short shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Good tan but short shelf life. I buy in the spring and by fall it's no good. I purchased the spray with mitt this time to see if there's a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Not True to Name
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past with great results. The one sent to me must have been colored water. When I took a shower in the morning, all the color washed down the drain! What a waste of my time and money! The product was not what the label says!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old/busted n green??!!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it old and green. (Gone bad) - will not order again!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self-tanner I've found to date. It looks like a real tan!! No orange, and no streaks!! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it darkens my sun spots. I used to live in the sun, and now that I'm in my 40's I have some sun damage and sun spots. This tans and darkens your skin, however it also darkens your sun spots. With that being said, since your skin is darker, I guess it all evens out. :)
customer_reviews.author: Winegal

customer_reviews.title: Nots so great
customer_reviews.text: I normally purchase the fake bake spray and just wanted to see if smoothing the lotion on would be easier... Bad idea! Had to use almost half of a bottle to get the color out put of just a little bit of the spray version. The coloring is also no where nears as natural looking as the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Sumer D M Lanum

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for a couple of years ,when I do not get sun and use this it looks nice UPDATE ..this last order i used the lotion and after a couple of days i turned orange so I dont know if my skin changed or the lotion .I Love the face one it works very well
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Lavalle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I order this every few months because I love it so much! Been using it for years and it looks so natural! Turned all of my friends into it too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharpy

customer_reviews.title: it flakes off
customer_reviews.text: This product by them is not near as good as the fake bake flawless liquid pump spray, now matter how much i exfoliated before using this, it would chunk around my ankles and knees. then when i would apply the next time, it was flake off and chunk up some more, no where else on my body though. it also smells like crayons which is not horrible, but it does give you a very realistic tan. make sure to wear gloves because it is almost impossible to scrub off! i would not recommend this product from the brand.
customer_reviews.author: taylor2009

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Sun Baking
customer_reviews.text: I am blond and fair complected so it takes me quite a bit of sun baking before I begin to tan. I've tried many sunless tanning products over the years and have returned to Fake Bake time and again. This product goes on smoothly, colors immediately and stays for a couple of days. It does transfer to light clothes and bed sheets but has not stained them and washes out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sndgriswald

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have tried MANY self tanners, and this is my favorite one for body. It is reasonably priced, it is natural looking, and it is easy to apply. I apply it prior to going to bed for the evening. If you want it darker you just apply again the next evening. I have friends that use it on their face. I have sensitive skin so I only use it for body. GREAT product
customer_reviews.author: T. D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Streak free natural look!
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many self tanners... This is the best!! The color guide really helped me to make sure that there were no streaks. I'm a "healthy" girl so even the hard to reach spots were perfect with this!! Yes!! Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Love this tanner
customer_reviews.text: Love. This is great sunless tanner. The only product ive ever used in 10 plus years that hasn't turned my skin umpa loompa orange. You won't be disappointed with your purchase by seller or manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: MelissaMae

customer_reviews.title: Fake bake
customer_reviews.text: I was a little intimidated at first because of the dark color. But, using gloves I was very happy with the results. Go slow until you are comfortable. Tip....read the label for helpful hints. Best using before bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I first heard about Fake Bake from a friend and then ordered my own. It goes on evenly and looks natural. There is no orange tint or bad odor with this product. It dries fast and doesn't transfer to my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! The tan is quick and looks authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a real tan!
customer_reviews.text: I have used loreal sunless tanner gel for years, and I thought that was the best product out there. I was wrong! Fake Bake gives me a more natural tan color and blends better around my hands and feet. I even used it on my face with no problems! My first time using it, I shaved and exfoliated, and used moisturizer on my knees, elbows, hands and feet. I blended Jergens natural glow with the Fake bake around my toes and ankles and around my wrists and hands. I did use the gloves that came with this product and my tan came out even with no streaks or lines. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mc

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: No streaks and gives a natural sun kissed color. By far, my favorite sunless tanner. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying Fake Bake but I've been pleased. It provides a rich brown color, dries quickly and I can use it on my face.
customer_reviews.author: GSD Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fake Bake Self Tanning
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product in the past and had great results. I'm not sure if something has changed or if I received old product. It is very runny and has a different color than before, it doesn't even leave the nice tan look that it has in the past. Not sure I'll be using this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Stone

customer_reviews.title: Fake Bake is the best self-tanner!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every self-tanner that there is and this is the best! I love the fact that it has a walnut-colored color guide. So you know exactly if you miss a spot, plus, you have an instant and perfectly brown tan!! No streaks!! No orange, or funky colors! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JMSS

customer_reviews.title: Greatest self tanner ever !
customer_reviews.text: Now this is the real deal I totally love it wish they could come with a better scent but 100% satisfied with this product!! Will be buying a lot more in future!! Best self tanning lotion ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Looks very natural and not too extreme!! Have used it several years and will continue to do so!!😉
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I get compliments on my tan all of the time. Put the product on the night before. Don't panic it will look dark at first. The next day when you shower it will wash off to a perfect even tan. I use nair hair removal lotion the get it off of my hands. The nair was an accidental find that works great. This lotion does not turn orange at all. The tan looks even better when you have a slight base tan already. However I use it even in the winter when I am very pale.
customer_reviews.author: K. Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Always loved fakebake.....as close to natural as you can get
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Best tanner out there.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use. I will definitely be keeping up with my tank this spring and summer. For anyone unsure, I am very light skinned and this product when put on evenly, works fabulous. I have gotten so many great complements. Looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, because it doesn't give the fake orange look.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best natural looking tan!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many self tanning products over the years. Fake bake is the most natural looking tan on the market! Another plus is Fake Bake wears like a natural tan! I use Fake Bake 12 months out of the year! Love it! Love it!! Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: will use forever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this for about 9 years. I love it. Its so easy to use. And the color is great. The color guide is a lifesaver for helping to avoid streaks. Use gloves unless you want cholocate brown colored palms. Also before application put lotion on knees/ feet/elbows to prevent too much color in those areas.
customer_reviews.author: kyla

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did ok in some areas the smell was not to pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: michelle m firmin

customer_reviews.title: But it leaves a very natural and amazing color behind
customer_reviews.text: Goes on very dark (as a guide) and you wouldn't want to wear out in public- so put on while you sleep. But it leaves a very natural and amazing color behind! Great self tanner!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoSun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & streak free!
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tan! Simple to apply lasts about a week with no reapply in between. Goes on evenly and doesn’t look orange.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Wade

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I am pale and do not tan well at all. I put this stuff on whenever I have something I want to look good for coming up and it has never failed me!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I can't get in the sun anymore and this provides me a nice summer tan color.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the store I ordered from
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the store I ordered from. Love the product but the last place I ordered from the product was old and had a green tint when applied. I've used Fake Bake for years and always get compliments on my tan, people not knowing it's fake! You have to make sure you keep it in the refrigerator till ready to use if you order more than one bottle at a time or over a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful when I read how everyone loved this stuff. I'm very pale naturally. While this went on "dark" after it's rubbed in, it looks great and overnight it leaves a natural looking "tan". It's the best one I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years to help reduce the splotchy white patches of vitiligo on my hands and arms. It does a great job. The newest bottle is a lot thicker in consistency than previous ones and is a just a bit harder to apply, but it still does a good job. The colorant in the product makes it easy to see where it's been applied. I found that a slightly damp makeup sponge makes a great applicator and helps spread it evenly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: I'll stick with Banana Boat self tanner.
customer_reviews.text: This product did decent as far as my being able to tell a difference within just an hour or so. But it is very messy and its very time consuming. It takes way longer to absorb than other self tanners I've used with very little difference in 'tanning'.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Use immediately or risk a liquidy green slime that will stain your counter and sink
customer_reviews.text: I order this product through Amazon routinely (and like it) but I didn't open one order for over 6 months and when I did, it was dark green and liquidy. Amazon would not let me return it. I advise you to not purchase this product unless you plan to use it immediately. It is also possible that it was exposed to extreme heat or cold prior to delivery; in which case, I paid full price for a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer rischitelli

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I expected with all the great reviews that this product would live up to the hype. I'm not sure if I got a bad bottle, or if all those "good" reviews are fake. I tried it on two occasions following the directions and I did not get a shade darker. It tints you when you put it on so you look tanner, but in the morning when I showered it all came off. I could still smell it on my skin but I wasn't any darker. Buy this at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: NYC_Shopper312

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured and the lotion sent was liquid because it was expired!!!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Best self-tanner, dies skin walnut color!
customer_reviews.text: Best self-tanner ever! Dies skin a walnut color, no orange. Stays longer than any other self-tanners because I think it dies the skin.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I use to use this all the time however the product has changed. I put it on and it smears, hard to get it on evenly. The next day I had a somewhat orange color to my skin. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Fake Bake best I've used!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best sunless tanning product I have used so far. Results are instant and looks very natural. No orange tint at all, just a natural looking tan like you have been laying in the tanning bed for weeks. I only gave four stars because the tan than you get after immediately applying fades rather quickly. I mainly use it after showering and results are best after shaving. Results are even better when you have somewhat of a tan already, but still works well on pale skin. Melanoma is prevalent in my family, so this is the best alternative to sunbathing and tanning beds for me.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Gives a great bronze color, long lasting, and easy to apply. This far surpasses any other self tanning product that I have used. No streaks, no orangey color. It dries quickly and even leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth as it does when using a regular moisturizing body lotion. My only recommendation for users would be to purchase an inexpenssive box of latex gloves...the product only comes with one set and, as one would imagine, they can only be used so many times before tearing or getting a bit grimey. No complaints - will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: A little messy application but if you use it with gloves its fine. I usually make sure to moisturize prior to ...
customer_reviews.text: on my 3rd bottle. A little messy application but if you use it with gloves its fine. I usually make sure to moisturize prior to application so it goes on even and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I used to love the Fake Bake Flawless Darker spray, but this is just as good! it's a beautiful olive color. the only reason I am giving it a four is because the lotion is a tad on the runny side, so if you't not careful too much dumps out of the bottle (which has happened to me quite a bit), but it's a great quality self-tanner!! Also, the smell is kind of gross, but there is pain in beauty, right??
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Jones

product_meta.title: Fake Bake Original Self-Tanning Lotion | Fast Acting, Natural Looking Sunless Tan For All Skin Tones | Streak Free, Flawless Glow Includes Gloves For Easy Application | 6 oz
feature_bullets: A NATURAL TAN, FOR EVERYONE - This patented triple tan formula, which contains naturally-derived tanning agents DHA, Erythrulose and DMI, enhances the natural pigment of your skin ensuring a streak-free natural tan for every skin tone.

FOOL PROOF APPLICATION - Fake Bake has a built-in color guide so you can see where you're applying the self-tanning product on your skin, ensuring streak-free application. No mess gloves are included!
A SAFER BEAUTIFUL BRONZE - Fake Bake is paraben and DMDM hydantoin free so you can feel secure knowing you are using a safe and healthy product.
NO ONE WILL KNOW, BUT YOU - Fake Bake's naturally-derived tanning agents will not turn skin orange, leave a bad odor, or stain your clothes.
TAN THAT LASTS AND LASTS - Fake Bake Self-Tanning Lotion features special natural ingredients and a patent-pending technology that deliver a deeper, darker tan that lasts up to 50% longer.
